Standards.description: An ISO-endorsed open standard for sharing disease and phenotype information.
Standards.name: Phenopackets

Ontologies.description: Provides a standardized vocabulary of phenotypic abnormalities in human disease.
Ontologies.name: HPO

Ontologies.description: Aims to harmonize disease definitions across the world.
Ontologies.name: Mondo

Tools.description: A tool for finding potential disease-causing variants in whole-exome or whole-genome sequencing data.
Tools.name: Exomiser

Tools.description: Integrates gene, disease, and phenotype data across species.
Tools.name: Monarch Knowledge Graph & Services
